scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana: Per Drop More Crop
description: The Per Drop More Crop component of PMKSY, launched in 2015, promotes micro-irrigation systems like drip and sprinkler to enhance water use efficiency and crop productivity.
key_features: Financial assistance for drip and sprinkler irrigation systems
Subsidies up to 55% for small farmers and 45% for others
Focus on water-scarce and rainfed areas

benefits.subsidy: Up to 55% for small and marginal farmers
benefits.water_efficiency: Improved water use and crop yield

criteria: Priority to small and marginal farmers
Land less than 2 hectares for maximum subsidy

steps: Apply through PMKSY portal or state agriculture department

special_notes: Loan available for installation, interest-free for first two years
